name: Amirthakadeswarer Exporters
description: manufacturer and supplier of a vast arra
overview:
Amirthakadeswarer Exporters came into existence in the year 2007 as a sole proprietorship business organization at Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. We are one of the eminent manufacturer and supplier of the industry engaged in offering a wide array of products such as Areca Leaf Forks, Areca Leaf Bowls, Areca Leaf Cups, Areca Leaf Plates, Areca Leaf Food Containers, Areca Leaf Trays, Areca Leaf Spoons, Snacks and Snack Packaging Material. These products are highly demanded in both commercial and domestic sectors for their premium quality standards and highly reliability.

Products & Services: Areca Leaf Cups Areca Leaf Bowls Areca Leaf Spoons Areca Leaf Trays

Our Quality Assurance: We are a quality-conscious business organization focusing on providing high-end quality products to the clients at industry leading prices. Our production process is carried out in adherence with prescribed industrial guidelines.

Infrastructure: We have constructed a hi-tech infrastructural facility over a vast area of land. This facility has been segregated into several departments, in order to ensure smooth working process. Our manufacturing unit is operational with technologically advanced machines and equipment, which enables us to produce a flawless product line for the clients.

Client Satisfaction: Since inception, we believe only satisfied clients are the best promoters of business of any organization. Hence, we strive to not only meet the demands of our clients but exceed their expectation level.
